mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into api_farm( id , SN , VillageName , HostName , Phone , Images , Sow , Boar , CommercialPig , DairyCow , Cattle , Goat , Sheep , LayingHen , Dorking , LayingDuck , MeatDuck , Goose , Other , HasPool , X , Y , Town , Owner , Area , Purpose , BuildDate , HasRecord , deleted , etlTime )values ( #{id}, #{SN}, #{VillageName}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{HostName},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e' )), #{Images}, #{Sow}, #{Boar}, #{CommercialPig}, #{DairyCow}, #{Cattle}, #{Goat}, #{Sheep}, #{LayingHen}, #{Dorking}, #{LayingDuck}, #{MeatDuck}, #{Goose}, #{Other}, #{HasPool}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Town}, #{Owner}, #{Area}, #{Purpose}, #{BuildDate}, #{HasRecord}, #{deleted}, #{etlTime} )

insert IGNORE into api_housing( id , IdCardNo , HouseholdNo , LiveProperty , BuildingProperty , BuildingUsage , UpLayerNum , DownLayerNum , NumPerLayer , HourseStatus , HourseUsage , HourseCode , Address , Town , VillageName , deleted , etlTime )values ( #{id}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), #{HouseholdNo}, #{LiveProperty}, #{BuildingProperty}, #{BuildingUsage}, #{UpLayerNum}, #{DownLayerNum}, #{NumPerLayer}, #{HourseStatus}, #{HourseUsage}, #{HourseCode}, #{Address}, #{Town}, #{VillageName}, #{deleted}, now() )

insert IGNORE into api_idlecourtyard( id , SN , VillageName , Pos , LandType , Area , Appendant , UsageStatus , Contractor , IdCardNo , ContractorPhone , Principal , PrincipalPhone , Images , X , Y , Town , Location , Purpose , Materiel , Lessor , GridMember , Phone , etlTime )values ( #{id}, #{SN}, #{VillageName}, #{Pos}, #{LandType}, #{Area}, #{Appendant}, #{UsageStatus}, #{Contractor}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{ContractorPhone},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Principal},'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{PrincipalPhone},'e' )), #{Images}, #{X}, #{Y}, #{Town}, #{Location}, #{Purpose}, #{Materiel}, #{Lessor}, #{GridMember}, #{Phone}, now() )
